Malleson wires 5th July :-"Reports regarding Askabad from various sources confirm the accession of the strength, and various informants estimate present garrison from 10,000 to 15,000, among whom is a large proportion of Persians Kirghiz and other Asiatics witli a backing of centre troops. According to some sources troops have arrived from west. Talk of invasion of Persia universally prevalent and' Bolshevik intention of utilising various routes of advance is noted. The general plan would be to make use of Persians and other connected Asiatics in order to give movement a patriotic and national character, and to work in with local risings."0
